lspci will list your pci devices, includ: type lspci into a terminal .. that's an L by the way

you problem may lie in the fact that you are running the server version.. your soundcard may not be compiled into the kernel module .. reccommend using the desktop live cd and see if sound works there ... another issue are VIA cards (some work, some just don't)
I am quite certain that you should be running a Desktop kernel ... running the server kernel will just give you headaches
